title: Get in Touch | Career Nexus 2025
text_lines: I understand and consent that any personal data, including but not limited to my name, company name, address, and/or email address, that I provide SIT may be used, collected, retained, and processed in accordance with

SIT periodically sends out communications to keep stakeholders updated about relevant programmes and courses, seminars, events, resources by SIT or its Overseas University partners, and surveys or analysis by SIT. If you would like to receive these communications and be part of our learning community, please tick the box to get started.

desc_divs:
I understand and consent that any personal data, including but not limited to my name, company name, address, and/or email address, that I provide SIT may be used, collected, retained, and processed in accordance with
SIT’s Personal Data Protection Policy

SIT periodically sends out communications to keep stakeholders updated about relevant programmes and courses, seminars, events, resources by SIT or its Overseas University partners, and surveys or analysis by SIT. If you would like to receive these communications and be part of our learning community, please tick the box to get started.
